Description: 2-character abbreviation for the domain, which must be "SM".
Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records. Should be assigned to be consistent with chronological order.
Name of the specific Disease Milestone. For types of Disease Milestones that can occur multiple times, the name will end with a sequence number. Example: "HYPO1".
The type of Disease Milestone. Example:"HYPOGLYCEMIC EVENT".
Start date or start date and time of Milestone Instance, if Milestone is an intervention or event, or date of Milestone if Milestone is a finding.
End date/time of Disease Milestone Instance.

Variable Label: Study Day of Start of Milestone
Description: Study day of start of Disease Milestone Instance, relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.

Variable Label: Study Day of End of Milestone
Description: Study day of end of Disease Milestone Instance, relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.
